DOC.brief_summary: Nexus is a collaboration between academic institutions, advocacy and industry to answer important questions about narcolepsy. It is a web-based observational study of patient-reported outcomes in adult patients with narcolepsy, with follow-up every six months. Nexus website: www.narcolepsyregistry.com
DOC.brief_title: A Web-based Observational Study of Patient-reported Outcomes in Adults With Narcolepsy
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Diagnosed with narcolepsy by a doctor
